entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
